product_name: Lowa Hudson GTX Mid Backpacking Boots - Women's
long_description: The women's leather Lowa Hudson GTX Mid Backpacking Boots are guaranteed to keep your feet dry throughout the backpacking season with dependable GORE-TEX waterproof, breathable technology. High-quality, full-grain leather uppers are made with plant-based tanning agents. Nylon shanks provide excellent stability and protection on rocky trails. Polyurethane midsoles absorb shock to keep your feet comfortable mile after mile. Lowa Trac(R) Lite II outsoles offer great grip on rough trails. Rubber toe guards on the Lowa Hudson GTX Mid Backpacking Boots add durability by protecting the leather from scuffs and scrapes.
short_description: The women's leather Lowa Hudson GTX Mid Backpacking Boots are guaranteed to keep your feet dry throughout the backpacking season with dependable GORE-TEX waterproof, breathable technology.
